national.name: Pradhan Mantri Krishi Sinchayee Yojana
national.objective: To enhance irrigation facilities and increase the area under irrigation.
national.details: The scheme aims to provide irrigation to every farm in India through the creation of irrigation infrastructure such as dams, canals, and tanks.
national.eligibility: Farmers and agricultural institutions with irrigation needs.

national.name: Soil Health Management Scheme
national.objective: To improve soil health through the use of organic and green fertilizers.
national.details: This scheme promotes soil testing, development of organic farming, and effective fertilizer management.
national.eligibility: Farmers, agricultural extension agencies, and state governments.

national.name: National Mission on Agricultural Extension and Technology
national.objective: To promote the use of technology in agricultural practices and improve the extension services for farmers.
national.details: This mission aims to provide technology-driven solutions to farmers for increasing productivity, including modern practices for soil health, pest control, and crop management.
national.eligibility: Farmers, agricultural extension workers, and state governments.

national.name: Fertilizer Subsidy Scheme
national.objective: To make fertilizers affordable for farmers by providing subsidies.
national.details: The government provides subsidies on chemical fertilizers to reduce the cost burden on farmers.
national.eligibility: Farmers using fertilizers for crop production.

national.name: National Agroforestry Policy
national.objective: To promote agroforestry for enhancing soil fertility and increasing plant diversity.
national.details: This policy aims to integrate trees into agricultural landscapes for sustainable agriculture and biodiversity conservation.
national.eligibility: Farmers, state governments, and agroforestry practitioners.

national.name: Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana
national.objective: To provide insurance coverage to farmers against crop loss due to natural calamities.
national.details: This scheme ensures financial support for farmers in case of crop failure due to adverse weather conditions or diseases.
national.eligibility: Farmers growing notified crops.

national.name: Rashtriya Krishi Vikas Yojana
national.objective: To promote and support agricultural development in all states and Union Territories.
national.details: This scheme aims to enhance the growth rate of the agricultural sector by promoting modern techniques, better crop varieties, and efficient resource use.
national.eligibility: Farmers, state governments, and agricultural institutions.

national.name: Kisan Credit Card Scheme
national.objective: To provide easy access to credit for farmers.
national.details: The scheme offers financial support to farmers for agricultural inputs like fertilizers, seeds, and pesticides through easy loans.
national.eligibility: Farmers, including individual farmers, groups of farmers, and joint farmers.

national.name: Pradhan Mantri Matsya Sampada Yojana
national.objective: To support the fisheries sector and improve the livelihood of fishermen.
national.details: This scheme focuses on sustainable aquaculture and the development of inland and marine fisheries.
national.eligibility: Fishermen, fish farmers, and fishery cooperatives.

national.name: National Horticulture Mission
national.objective: To promote horticultural production, improve quality, and increase export opportunities.
national.details: The mission focuses on the cultivation of fruits, vegetables, and flowers while enhancing post-harvest infrastructure and promoting organic farming.
national.eligibility: Farmers, cooperatives, and state horticulture departments.

national.name: Pradhan Mantri Kisan Samman Nidhi (PM-KISAN)
national.objective: To provide direct income support to farmers.
national.details: Under this scheme, farmers are given an income of ₹6,000 per year in three equal installments to support their livelihood and agricultural activities.
national.eligibility: Small and marginal farmers.

national.name: Zero Budget Natural Farming
national.objective: To promote farming without the use of chemical fertilizers and pesticides.
national.details: This initiative encourages organic farming practices, focusing on natural inputs and soil health improvement.
national.eligibility: Farmers interested in adopting natural farming methods.

national.name: National Food Security Mission
national.objective: To increase the production of food grains, pulses, and oilseeds.
national.details: The mission focuses on improving the productivity of crops and ensuring food security in the country.
national.eligibility: Farmers and agricultural institutions.

national.name: Bharat Nirman Yojana
national.objective: To improve rural infrastructure and enhance agricultural productivity.
national.details: The scheme focuses on improving irrigation, rural roads, and electrification to facilitate agricultural growth.
national.eligibility: Rural areas, including farmers and agricultural businesses.

national.name: Crop Diversification Programme
national.objective: To promote crop diversification in water-stressed areas.
national.details: This program encourages farmers to move from water-intensive crops to crops requiring less water, ensuring long-term sustainability.
national.eligibility: Farmers in water-stressed regions.

national.name: National Mission for Sustainable Agriculture
national.objective: To promote sustainable agricultural practices and improve soil health.
national.details: This mission aims to introduce practices that help maintain and improve soil fertility while reducing the environmental footprint of agriculture.
national.eligibility: Farmers and agricultural institutions.

national.name: Mission Organic Value Chain Development for North Eastern Region
national.objective: To promote organic farming and the development of organic value chains.
national.details: This scheme focuses on the development of organic farming in the northeastern states of India and establishing a value chain for organic produce.
national.eligibility: Farmers in North Eastern states of India interested in organic farming.

national.name: Sub-Mission on Plant Protection and Plant Quarantine
national.objective: To safeguard crops from plant diseases and pests.
national.details: The mission works on implementing pest control measures and ensuring the health of plants and crops throughout India.
national.eligibility: Farmers, state governments, and agricultural research institutions.

national.name: National Crop Insurance Scheme
national.objective: To provide insurance coverage for crop losses due to natural disasters.
national.details: This scheme aims to protect farmers from financial losses arising from crop damage due to weather changes, pest attacks, or diseases.
national.eligibility: Farmers growing notified crops.

national.name: National Agricultural Market (eNAM)
national.objective: To promote the online marketing of agricultural products and ensure transparent trading.
national.details: eNAM aims to create a unified national market for agricultural commodities by connecting agricultural markets across India through an online platform.
national.eligibility: Farmers, traders, and commission agents.

national.name: Pradhan Mantri Kisan Maandhan Yojana
national.objective: To provide pension benefits to small and marginal farmers.
national.details: Under this scheme, farmers between the age of 18 and 40 will receive a monthly pension after reaching the age of 60, subject to certain conditions.
national.eligibility: Small and marginal farmers between the age of 18 to 40 years.

national.name: National Mission on Protein Supplements
national.objective: To promote protein-rich food production and increase livestock farming.
national.details: The scheme focuses on increasing the availability of protein-rich foods like pulses, oilseeds, and animal husbandry products.
national.eligibility: Farmers involved in animal husbandry, poultry, and fisheries.

national.name: National Bee Keeping and Honey Mission
national.objective: To promote beekeeping and honey production to enhance income generation and pollination.
national.details: The mission aims to improve the production of honey and increase the quality of bee products while promoting pollination activities.
national.eligibility: Farmers, beekeepers, and agricultural organizations.

national.name: Integrated Scheme on Agricultural Marketing
national.objective: To improve the marketing infrastructure and promote agricultural markets in rural areas.
national.details: The scheme focuses on upgrading market infrastructure and providing training to farmers for better marketing of their produce.
national.eligibility: Farmers, agricultural cooperatives, and market committees.

national.name: State Horticulture Missions
national.objective: To promote horticulture and ensure the supply of quality fruits and vegetables.
national.details: The scheme supports the production of fruits, vegetables, and flowers through financial support and the development of infrastructure.
national.eligibility: Farmers and horticulture institutions.

national.name: Promotion of Organic Farming
national.objective: To encourage organic farming practices for sustainable agriculture.
national.details: The scheme supports organic farming through certification, training, and marketing of organic products.
national.eligibility: Farmers, agricultural groups, and cooperatives.

national.name: Micro Irrigation Scheme
national.objective: To promote efficient water use through micro-irrigation techniques like drip and sprinkler systems.
national.details: The scheme aims to conserve water and improve crop yields by promoting the adoption of micro-irrigation technologies.
national.eligibility: Farmers who wish to adopt micro-irrigation methods.

national.name: Mission on Climate Resilient Agriculture
national.objective: To promote climate-resilient agricultural practices to mitigate the effects of climate change.
national.details: This mission aims to help farmers adapt to climate variability and reduce their vulnerability to climate-related risks.
national.eligibility: Farmers, agricultural scientists, and climate change experts.

national.name: Kisan Rinn Yojana (Kisan Credit Scheme)
national.objective: To provide farmers with easy access to credit for farming activities.
national.details: This scheme offers affordable credit to farmers for purchasing inputs, technology, and equipment for agriculture.
national.eligibility: Farmers, both individuals and joint groups.

national.name: Pradhan Mantri Swasthya Suraksha Yojana
national.objective: To provide healthcare to rural farmers and ensure better health services.
national.details: This scheme ensures access to affordable and quality healthcare services to farmers and their families.
national.eligibility: Farmers and rural communities.

national.name: National Watershed Management Project
national.objective: To ensure sustainable water management and increase water availability for agriculture.
national.details: The project works on watershed development activities to improve water use efficiency and ensure better resource management.
national.funding: Government of India and State Governments
national.eligibility: Farmers, rural communities, and watershed development authorities.

national.name: Bamboo and Rattan Development Scheme
national.objective: To promote the development and commercialization of bamboo and rattan products.
national.details: The scheme aims to enhance the value chain for bamboo and rattan cultivation and create livelihood opportunities in rural areas.
national.eligibility: Farmers, bamboo growers, and rural artisans.

national.name: Pradhan Mantri Jan Arogya Yojana (PMJAY)
national.objective: To provide health insurance coverage for economically weaker farmers.
national.details: The scheme provides health insurance to families, covering hospitalization costs and medical expenses for farmers and their families.
national.eligibility: Farmers and economically weaker sections of society.

national.name: Agri-Tech Infrastructure Fund
national.objective: To improve the technological infrastructure in agriculture.
national.details: This fund supports the development and implementation of technology solutions to increase agricultural productivity and sustainability.
national.eligibility: Agricultural startups, institutions, and farmers.

Maharashtra.name: Mahatma Jyotirao Phule Jan Arogya Yojana
Maharashtra.description: Health insurance scheme for families below the poverty line in Maharashtra.
Maharashtra.eligibility: Residents of Maharashtra holding yellow or orange ration cards.

Maharashtra.name: Ekatmik Sheti Vikas Yojana
Maharashtra.description: Focuses on integrated agricultural development for farmers.

Maharashtra.name: Pik Vima Yojana
Maharashtra.description: Crop insurance scheme to protect farmers against crop loss.

Maharashtra.name: Chief Minister Sustainable Agriculture Irrigation Scheme (Magel Tyala Shettale)
Maharashtra.description: Provides financial assistance to farmers for constructing farm ponds to store rainwater, enhancing irrigation facilities.
Maharashtra.eligibility: Farmers with a minimum of 0.20 hectares in Konkan region or 0.40 hectares in other regions.

Maharashtra.name: Maha Krishi Samrudhi Yojana (MKSY)
Maharashtra.description: Promotes agricultural development by supporting food and agro-based industries and agricultural infrastructure projects.
Maharashtra.eligibility: Farmers and entrepreneurs involved in agricultural projects.

Maharashtra.name: Gaon Tethe Godam Scheme
Maharashtra.description: Aims to establish storage facilities at the village level to reduce post-harvest losses and improve market access for farmers.

Maharashtra.name: State Agriculture Mechanization Scheme
Maharashtra.description: Provides subsidies to farmers for purchasing agricultural machinery, enhancing productivity and reducing manual labor.
Maharashtra.eligibility: Farmers with Aadhaar cards and land ownership documents.

Maharashtra.name: Atal Bhujal Yojana (Maharashtra Implementation)
Maharashtra.description: Promotes sustainable groundwater management practices through community participation.
Maharashtra.eligibility: Farmers dependent on groundwater for irrigation in Maharashtra.

Tamil Nadu.name: Chief Minister’s Comprehensive Health Insurance Scheme
Tamil Nadu.description: Free health insurance scheme for residents of Tamil Nadu.
Tamil Nadu.eligibility: Residents of Tamil Nadu with annual income below ₹72,000.

Tamil Nadu.name: Solar Powered Pump Scheme
Tamil Nadu.description: Provides subsidies for installing solar pumps for irrigation.

Tamil Nadu.name: Farm Mechanization Scheme
Tamil Nadu.description: Promotes the use of modern agricultural machinery to increase productivity.
Tamil Nadu.eligibility: Farmers in Tamil Nadu with Aadhaar and land ownership.

Tamil Nadu.name: Construction of Farm Ponds
Tamil Nadu.description: Supports water conservation by subsidizing farm pond construction.
Tamil Nadu.eligibility: 90% subsidy for general farmers, 95% for SC/ST farmers.

Tamil Nadu.name: Tamil Nadu Mission on Sustainable Dryland Development (TNMSDD)
Tamil Nadu.description: Enhances the productivity of dryland areas through sustainable farming practices.
Tamil Nadu.eligibility: Small and marginal farmers in arid regions of Tamil Nadu.

Tamil Nadu.name: Micro Irrigation (MI) Scheme
Tamil Nadu.description: Encourages efficient water use with subsidies for drip and sprinkler irrigation systems.
Tamil Nadu.eligibility: Farmers with Aadhaar and eligible landholdings.

Tamil Nadu.name: Kalaignarin Anaithu Grama Orunginaindha Velan Valarchi Thittam
Tamil Nadu.description: Converts wasteland into cultivable agricultural land to expand farming areas.
Tamil Nadu.eligibility: Farmers owning wasteland in Tamil Nadu.

Tamil Nadu.name: Perimetro Vegetable Cluster Development Program
Tamil Nadu.description: Promotes vegetable cultivation around urban areas to meet local demands.
Tamil Nadu.eligibility: Farmers near urban centers engaged in vegetable farming.

Tamil Nadu.name: Special Scheme for Millets Production
Tamil Nadu.description: Boosts the production of millets like ragi, kambu, and samai.
Tamil Nadu.eligibility: Farmers cultivating millets in Tamil Nadu.

Uttar Pradesh.name: Kisan Rin Mochan Yojana
Uttar Pradesh.description: Waives loans for small and marginal farmers in Uttar Pradesh.
Uttar Pradesh.eligibility: Small and marginal farmers with loans up to ₹1 lakh.

Uttar Pradesh.name: One District One Product Scheme
Uttar Pradesh.description: Encourages local crafts and industries in every district.
Uttar Pradesh.eligibility: Entrepreneurs and artisans in Uttar Pradesh.

Uttar Pradesh.name: Kisan Samman Nidhi Yojana (UP Implementation)
Uttar Pradesh.description: Provides direct income support to farmers.
Uttar Pradesh.eligibility: Small and marginal farmers owning cultivable land.

Uttar Pradesh.name: UP Micro Irrigation Scheme
Uttar Pradesh.description: Promotes efficient irrigation methods through subsidies for drip and sprinkler systems.
Uttar Pradesh.eligibility: Farmers in Uttar Pradesh with eligible landholdings.

Uttar Pradesh.name: UP Mukhyamantri Krishak Durghatna Kalyan Yojana
Uttar Pradesh.description: Provides financial assistance to families of farmers in case of accidents.
Uttar Pradesh.eligibility: Farmers and their families in Uttar Pradesh.

Uttar Pradesh.name: National Horticulture Mission (NHM - UP Implementation)
Uttar Pradesh.description: Encourages diversification into horticulture for improved productivity and income.

Uttar Pradesh.name: Krishi Input Subsidy Scheme
Uttar Pradesh.description: Offers subsidies on fertilizers, seeds, and pesticides to boost agricultural productivity.

Uttar Pradesh.name: UP Beej Anudan Yojana
Uttar Pradesh.description: Provides subsidized seeds to farmers to ensure better yields.
Uttar Pradesh.eligibility: Farmers registered with the Uttar Pradesh agriculture department.

Uttar Pradesh.name: UP Organic Farming Promotion Scheme
Uttar Pradesh.description: Promotes organic farming practices by providing financial assistance and training.

Rajasthan.name: Mukhyamantri Jal Swavalamban Abhiyan
Rajasthan.description: Promotes water conservation through community participation.
Rajasthan.eligibility: Residents of Rajasthan involved in water conservation.

Rajasthan.name: Rajasthan Krishi Yantra Subsidy Yojana
Rajasthan.description: Provides subsidies for the purchase of modern agricultural machinery.

Rajasthan.name: Rajasthan Mukhyamantri Kisan Mitra Urja Yojana
Rajasthan.description: Offers financial relief on electricity bills for farmers.
Rajasthan.eligibility: Farmers in Rajasthan with active electricity connections.

Rajasthan.name: Rajasthan Solar Pump Subsidy Scheme
Rajasthan.description: Promotes solar-powered irrigation by providing subsidies on solar pumps.

Rajasthan.name: Rajiv Gandhi Jal Sanchay Yojana
Rajasthan.description: Focuses on rainwater harvesting and groundwater conservation.
Rajasthan.eligibility: Villages and urban areas in Rajasthan.

Rajasthan.name: Rajasthan Apna Khata Yojana
Rajasthan.description: Provides online land record access for farmers.

Rajasthan.name: Rajasthan Agro Processing and Agri Business Promotion Policy
Rajasthan.description: Encourages setting up of agro-processing units and agri-businesses.

Rajasthan.name: Rajasthan Organic Farming Mission
Rajasthan.description: Supports organic farming practices with financial aid and training.
Rajasthan.eligibility: Farmers practicing organic farming in Rajasthan.

Rajasthan.name: Rajasthan Livestock Development Scheme
Rajasthan.description: Promotes livestock rearing and provides subsidies for animal husbandry.

Kerala.name: Subhiksha Keralam Scheme
Kerala.description: Aims to enhance agricultural production by utilizing fallow land.
Kerala.eligibility: Farmers, self-help groups, and cooperatives in Kerala.

Kerala.name: Kerala Agro Machinery Subsidy Scheme
Kerala.description: Provides subsidies for purchasing agricultural machinery and equipment.
Kerala.eligibility: Farmers in Kerala with valid land records.

Kerala.name: Haritha Keralam Mission
Kerala.description: Focuses on organic farming and sustainable agricultural practices.
Kerala.eligibility: Farmers and self-help groups adopting organic farming in Kerala.

Kerala.name: Ksheera Sagaram Project
Kerala.description: Promotes dairy farming by providing financial assistance and training.

Kerala.name: Vikasana Karshaka Scheme
Kerala.description: Supports the cultivation of high-value crops and modern farming methods.
Kerala.eligibility: Farmers registered with the agriculture department in Kerala.

Kerala.name: Kerala Vegetable Development Program
Kerala.description: Encourages vegetable cultivation and provides subsidies for seeds and fertilizers.
Kerala.eligibility: Farmers and cooperatives involved in vegetable farming in Kerala.

Kerala.name: Jaiva Keralam Project
Kerala.description: Promotes organic farming and sustainable agricultural practices.
Kerala.eligibility: Farmers practicing organic farming methods in Kerala.

Kerala.name: Plantation Development Scheme
Kerala.description: Supports the development and expansion of plantation crops like rubber, tea, and coffee.
Kerala.eligibility: Plantation owners and farmers in Kerala.

Kerala.name: Micro Irrigation Scheme (Kerala)
Kerala.description: Encourages water conservation through subsidies for drip and sprinkler irrigation systems.
Kerala.eligibility: Farmers in Kerala with eligible landholdings.

Kerala.name: Soil Health Management Scheme
Kerala.description: Promotes soil testing and provides recommendations for improving soil fertility.
Kerala.eligibility: Farmers in Kerala with agricultural land.

Jharkhand.name: Mukhyamantri Krishi Ashirwad Yojana
Jharkhand.description: Provides financial assistance to small and marginal farmers for agriculture.
Jharkhand.eligibility: Small and marginal farmers in Jharkhand with landholdings up to 5 acres.

Jharkhand.name: Johar Yojana
Jharkhand.description: Aims to improve rural livelihoods through agricultural and allied activities.
Jharkhand.eligibility: Rural households in Jharkhand engaged in agriculture.

Jharkhand.name: Birsa Harit Gram Yojana
Jharkhand.description: Promotes tree plantation and agroforestry to enhance rural livelihoods.
Jharkhand.eligibility: Farmers and rural households in Jharkhand.

Jharkhand.name: Soil Health Card Scheme (Jharkhand Implementation)
Jharkhand.description: Provides soil health cards with recommendations to improve fertility.
Jharkhand.eligibility: Farmers with agricultural land in Jharkhand.

Jharkhand.name: Jharkhand Krishi Mitra Yojana
Jharkhand.description: Supports farmers with technical knowledge and tools for modern farming.
Jharkhand.eligibility: Farmers in Jharkhand registered with agriculture departments.

Jharkhand.name: Jharkhand Micro Irrigation Scheme
Jharkhand.description: Promotes drip and sprinkler irrigation systems for water conservation.
Jharkhand.eligibility: Farmers with eligible landholdings in Jharkhand.

Jharkhand.name: Organic Farming Promotion Scheme
Jharkhand.description: Encourages organic farming practices with financial aid and training.
Jharkhand.eligibility: Farmers practicing or transitioning to organic farming in Jharkhand.

Jharkhand.name: Seed Distribution Subsidy Scheme
Jharkhand.description: Provides high-quality seeds at subsidized rates to farmers.
Jharkhand.eligibility: Farmers registered under Jharkhand agriculture schemes.

Jharkhand.name: Drought Relief Assistance Scheme
Jharkhand.description: Offers financial assistance to farmers affected by drought.
Jharkhand.eligibility: Farmers in drought-affected regions of Jharkhand.

Jharkhand.name: Jharkhand Horticulture Development Scheme
Jharkhand.description: Supports horticultural crop cultivation with subsidies and training.
Jharkhand.eligibility: Farmers cultivating horticultural crops in Jharkhand.

Jharkhand.name: Agricultural Equipment Subsidy Scheme
Jharkhand.description: Provides subsidies for purchasing modern agricultural machinery.
Jharkhand.eligibility: Farmers registered under Jharkhand agriculture programs.

Karnataka.name: Raita Vidya Nidhi Scheme
Karnataka.description: Scholarship program for children of farmers in Karnataka.
Karnataka.eligibility: Children of farmers studying in Karnataka.

Karnataka.name: Krishi Bhagya Scheme
Karnataka.description: Provides financial assistance for constructing farm ponds and adopting water conservation practices.
Karnataka.eligibility: Farmers in rain-fed areas of Karnataka.

Karnataka.name: Suvarna Bhoomi Yojana
Karnataka.description: Encourages organic farming practices and sustainable agriculture.
Karnataka.eligibility: Farmers transitioning to organic farming in Karnataka.

Karnataka.name: Micro Irrigation Scheme (Karnataka)
Karnataka.description: Supports drip and sprinkler irrigation systems to improve water efficiency.
Karnataka.eligibility: Farmers with eligible landholdings in Karnataka.

Karnataka.name: Karnataka Raitha Suraksha Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana
Karnataka.description: Crop insurance scheme to protect farmers against crop loss.
Karnataka.eligibility: Farmers growing insured crops in Karnataka.

Karnataka.name: Bhoochetana Scheme
Karnataka.description: Improves soil health and productivity through micronutrient application.
Karnataka.eligibility: Farmers with agricultural land in Karnataka.

Karnataka.name: Raitha Siri Scheme
Karnataka.description: Provides financial assistance for cultivating millets to promote nutrition security.

Karnataka.name: Farm Machinery Subsidy Scheme
Karnataka.description: Offers subsidies for purchasing modern agricultural machinery.

Karnataka.name: Organic Farming Policy Support Scheme
Karnataka.description: Promotes organic farming with financial incentives and training.
Karnataka.eligibility: Farmers practicing organic farming in Karnataka.

Karnataka.name: Karnataka Horticulture Development Scheme
Karnataka.description: Supports the cultivation of horticultural crops through subsidies and technical support.
Karnataka.eligibility: Farmers cultivating horticultural crops in Karnataka.

Karnataka.name: Raitha Mitra Yojana
Karnataka.description: Provides comprehensive support to farmers, including financial assistance and resources.
Karnataka.eligibility: Farmers registered under Karnataka's agriculture programs.

Madhya Pradesh.name: Ladli Laxmi Yojana
Madhya Pradesh.description: Encourages the education and welfare of girl children in Madhya Pradesh.

Madhya Pradesh.name: Mukhyamantri Kisan Kalyan Yojana
Madhya Pradesh.description: Provides financial aid to farmers for agricultural purposes.

Madhya Pradesh.name: Bhavantar Bhugtan Yojana
Madhya Pradesh.description: Provides compensation to farmers for price differences between MSP and market rates.
Madhya Pradesh.eligibility: Farmers selling notified crops in Madhya Pradesh.

Madhya Pradesh.name: Krishak Udhyami Yojana
Madhya Pradesh.description: Offers financial assistance for setting up agri-based industries.
Madhya Pradesh.eligibility: Farmers and agricultural entrepreneurs in Madhya Pradesh.

Madhya Pradesh.name: MP Soil Health Card Scheme
Madhya Pradesh.description: Promotes soil testing and provides recommendations to improve soil fertility.
Madhya Pradesh.eligibility: Farmers with agricultural land in Madhya Pradesh.

Madhya Pradesh.name: Mukhyamantri Solar Pump Yojana
Madhya Pradesh.description: Subsidizes solar pumps for irrigation to reduce dependency on diesel and electricity.
Madhya Pradesh.eligibility: Farmers with small and medium landholdings.

Madhya Pradesh.name: Gramin Krishi Mausam Seva
Madhya Pradesh.description: Provides weather-related agricultural advice to farmers.
Madhya Pradesh.eligibility: Farmers registered with the agriculture department.

Madhya Pradesh.name: Horticulture Development Scheme
Madhya Pradesh.description: Supports the cultivation of horticultural crops with financial and technical assistance.
Madhya Pradesh.eligibility: Farmers growing fruits, vegetables, and spices in Madhya Pradesh.

Madhya Pradesh.name: MP Farm Mechanization Scheme
Madhya Pradesh.description: Offers subsidies for purchasing modern agricultural machinery.
Madhya Pradesh.eligibility: Farmers registered under Madhya Pradesh's agriculture programs.

Madhya Pradesh.name: Organic Farming Promotion Scheme
Madhya Pradesh.description: Encourages organic farming practices by providing financial assistance and training.
Madhya Pradesh.eligibility: Farmers adopting organic farming methods in Madhya Pradesh.

Madhya Pradesh.name: Pradhan Mantri Krishi Sinchai Yojana (State Component)
Madhya Pradesh.description: Supports irrigation projects to increase water efficiency for agriculture.
Madhya Pradesh.eligibility: Farmers in Madhya Pradesh using water-efficient techniques.

Manipur.name: Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana (PMFBY)
Manipur.description: Provides crop insurance coverage to farmers against natural calamities, pests, and diseases.
Manipur.eligibility: All farmers growing notified crops in areas identified for coverage.

Manipur.name: Pradhan Mantri Kisan Samman Nidhi (PM-KISAN)
Manipur.description: Provides direct income support to small and marginal farmers.
Manipur.eligibility: All small and marginal farmers who own cultivable land.

Manipur.name: Soil Health Management Scheme
Manipur.description: Aims to improve soil health and increase agricultural productivity.

Manipur.name: National Agriculture Market (e-NAM)
Manipur.description: A platform that connects farmers with markets to promote direct marketing of agricultural products.
Manipur.eligibility: Farmers and traders participating in agricultural trade.

Manipur.name: National Food Security Mission (NFSM)
Manipur.description: Aims to increase the production of food grains, oilseeds, and pulses.
Manipur.eligibility: Farmers cultivating rice, wheat, pulses, and oilseeds.

Manipur.name: Pradhan Mantri Krishi Sinchayee Yojana (PMKSY)
Manipur.description: Aims to increase the coverage of irrigation in agriculture through various water conservation schemes.

Manipur.name: Rashtriya Krishi Vikas Yojana (RKVY)
Manipur.description: Focuses on the development of agriculture and its allied sectors.
Manipur.eligibility: State governments, agricultural organizations, and farmers.

Manipur.name: Farmers Welfare Fund Scheme
Manipur.description: Provides financial assistance for the welfare and empowerment of farmers.

Manipur.name: Pradhan Mantri Jan Dhan Yojana (PMJDY) - Agriculture Focus
Manipur.description: Financial inclusion program aimed at bringing farmers into the banking system, enabling them to get easy access to loans.
Manipur.eligibility: All farmers, particularly those without access to formal banking.

Manipur.name: Mukhyamantri Krishi Vikas Yojana
Manipur.description: State-level scheme for increasing the production of crops, promoting advanced agricultural practices.

Meghalaya.name: Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana (PMFBY)
Meghalaya.description: Provides crop insurance to farmers to protect against natural disasters, pests, and diseases.

Meghalaya.name: Pradhan Mantri Kisan Samman Nidhi (PM-KISAN)
Meghalaya.description: Direct income support for small and marginal farmers.
Meghalaya.eligibility: Small and marginal farmers owning cultivable land.

Meghalaya.name: National Agriculture Market (e-NAM)
Meghalaya.description: A digital platform for farmers to sell produce directly to buyers, reducing the influence of middlemen.
Meghalaya.eligibility: Farmers and traders participating in agricultural trade.

Meghalaya.name: Soil Health Management Scheme
Meghalaya.description: Improves soil health through the distribution of soil health cards and the promotion of organic farming.

Meghalaya.name: National Food Security Mission (NFSM)
Meghalaya.description: Aims to enhance the production of food grains, oilseeds, and pulses through various schemes and subsidies.
Meghalaya.eligibility: Farmers engaged in the cultivation of rice, wheat, pulses, and oilseeds.

Meghalaya.name: Pradhan Mantri Krishi Sinchayee Yojana (PMKSY)
Meghalaya.description: Focuses on irrigation and water conservation to improve water use efficiency in agriculture.
Meghalaya.eligibility: Farmers engaged in agriculture requiring irrigation facilities.

Meghalaya.name: Rashtriya Krishi Vikas Yojana (RKVY)
Meghalaya.description: Supports agricultural development by providing financial assistance to states to increase agricultural productivity.

Meghalaya.name: Mahatma Gandhi National Rural Employment Guarantee Act (MGNREGA)
Meghalaya.description: Provides employment to rural households, with a focus on agriculture-related work such as irrigation and water conservation.

Meghalaya.name: Fisheries and Aquaculture Infrastructure Development Fund (FIDF)
Meghalaya.description: Promotes sustainable fish farming and the development of infrastructure in the fisheries sector.
Meghalaya.eligibility: Farmers, cooperatives, and entrepreneurs in the fisheries sector.

Meghalaya.name: Meghalaya State Rural Livelihood Society (MSRLS) – Livelihood Support for Farmers
Meghalaya.description: Focuses on enhancing the livelihood of farmers and agricultural workers by providing training and financial support.

Mizoram.name: Mizoram State Organic Farming Scheme
Mizoram.description: Promotes organic farming by providing subsidies for organic fertilizers and training for farmers.

Himachal Pradesh.description: Provides subsidies and support for soil testing and soil health improvement.

Himachal Pradesh.name: Agroforestry Promotion Scheme
Himachal Pradesh.description: Encourages farmers to plant trees alongside crops to increase farm income and enhance biodiversity.

Himachal Pradesh.name: Himachal Pradesh Animal Husbandry Scheme
Himachal Pradesh.description: Provides financial assistance for the development of livestock farming and animal health services.
Himachal Pradesh.eligibility: Farmers and livestock owners in Himachal Pradesh.

Himachal Pradesh.name: Mukhya Mantri Krishi Ashirwad Yojana
Himachal Pradesh.description: Offers financial support to farmers for the development of agricultural infrastructure and purchase of equipment.
